ClassDesc: Span that replaces the text it's attached to with a @B_android#graphics#drawable#Drawable_E@ that can be aligned with the bottom or with the baseline of the surrounding text. The drawable can be constructed from varied sources: @B_android#graphics#Bitmap_E@ - see @B_android#text#style#ImageSpan#ImageSpan_E@ and @B_android#text#style#ImageSpan#ImageSpan_E@ @B_android#graphics#drawable#Drawable_E@ - see @B_android#text#style#ImageSpan#ImageSpan_E@ resource id - see @B_android#text#style#ImageSpan#ImageSpan_E@ @B_android#net#Uri_E@ - see @B_android#text#style#ImageSpan#ImageSpan_E@ The default value for the vertical alignment is @B_android#text#style#DynamicDrawableSpan#ALIGN_BOTTOM_E@ For example, an ImagedSpan can be used like this:
